Class Graph

java.lang.Object
io.github.kaktushose.proteus.graph.Graph
public final class Graph extends Object

Undirected, unweighted graph of all possible conversion paths.

Types are the vertices of this graph. Each Type can have n neighbours. However, there cannot be multiple vertices of the same Type. The ProteusBuilder.ConflictStrategy is used to resolve conflicting duplicate paths.

Each edge is associated with exactly one Mapper.UniMapper.

Use

invalid reference 
#register(Type, Type, Mapper, ConflictStrategy)
to add a new path to this graph. You can retrieve paths by

calling path(Type, Type). Resolved paths are cached in an LRU-Cache for future lookups.

  • Constructor Details

    • Graph

      public Graph(int cacheSize)
      Creates a new Graph with the given cache size.
      Parameters:
      cacheSize - the cache size to use for the LRU-Cache

  • Method Details

    • adjustCacheSize

      public void adjustCacheSize(int newSize)
      Adjusts the size of the LRU-Cache. This will create a new cache object and erase the previous one.
      Parameters:
      newSize - the new cache size to use for the LRU-Cache

    • register

      public <S, T> void register(@NotNull @NotNull Type<S> from, @NotNull @NotNull Type<T> into, @NotNull @NotNull Mapper<S,T> mapper, @NotNull @NotNull ProteusBuilder.ConflictStrategy strategy, @NotNull @NotNull Flag... flags)
      Registers a new conversion path. More formally this will add the from Type as a new vertex of this graph and the into Type as a neighbour of it and associate the given Mapper to this newly formed edge.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the type of the from Type
      T - the type of into from Type
      Parameters:
      from - the source Type of the conversion path
      into - the destination Type of the conversion path
      mapper - the Mapper to associate with this edge
      strategy - the ProteusBuilder.ConflictStrategy to use if the from Type is already registered as a vertex

    • path

      @NotNull public @NotNull List<Edge> path(@NotNull @NotNull Type<?> source, @NotNull @NotNull Type<?> target)
      Attempts to find a path that connects the two given Types. Returns an empty List if no path was found.
      Parameters:
      source - the source Type of the route
      target - the destination Type of the route
      Returns:
      a possibly-empty List of Edges that connect the source and target Type
